description:
Nerdy Alex Hawk borrowed money from the neighborhood thug, Wolf Hudson. Now he can’t pay. Wolf is going to make him his wedgie slave until he pays up.

Alex heard about this and he’s terrified. There’s nothing he can do. Wolf quickly overpowers him and humiliates him with wedgies. He gets him off the ground with a few.

After a lot of good humiliation, Wolf sends Alex to his room to pick out some nicer underwear…

Alex returns to his bully, Wolf Hudson. Alex did as told and picked out the nicest underwear he has. Wolf puts him through the ringer with his tight black undies. He’s got himself a new wedgie slave.

Alex begs for just one more day to pay him. Wolf tells him he’ll give him one day to pay. But he’s going to fuck his ass… then Wolf leaves.
title: Alex Hawk Pays with Wedgies
